comment: Hello .When I try to edit my text after reviewing the translation the edit box is tiny and at the top of the screen. Most of the screen is, wasted and its very difficult to edit the text. I cannot believe that Google would build an editor as poor as this. Is there a work around. surely there must be. If not, it need an aftermarket editor of some description. The editing window is shown below minus the popup keyboard.Please resolve this issue 馃檹.

Requesting a workaround or aftermarket editor for improved editing functionality.
